DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics UB-921 Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: This open-label , two-part , dose-escalation comparative pharmacokinetics ( PK ) study UB-921 healthy male volunteer . Eligible volunteer sequentially enrol 3 escalating-dose cohort study site . After administration single-dose intravenous infusion UB-921 , subject follow 63 day monitor safety , tolerability , PK parameter .
